course.title: English Workman (auto-generated)
course.description:
Auto-Generated for ordered letters: t h s a n e o i g y c l d r u p q w b j f z x m v k
By Peter Feigl <craven@gmx.net>

lesson.title: Lesson 1 - t, h, s and a
lesson.text: tats Sat Sasha at hats stat stash Sta ah that ash stats sash hast shah aha Shasta Tasha ta a Ha sat Ta hath Haas as aah ha has shahs asst tat hat hash sass Tass

lesson.title: Lesson 2 - n
lesson.text: Nathan Attn assn Shana tn tan Hannah Santana Nathans Astana Hahn Thant Anshan naans ants attn Sana Han Santa Ann Thanh sans San n nth Shanna tans Nan ans an Stan Hans nah than Anna ant Sn naan Ana Satan Hanna

lesson.title: Lesson 3 - e
lesson.text: tenet Sennett antenna neatens tannest Tennesseans set settee sets tsetses Tenn senna sent heaths tensest tsetse hates entente assesses ea teen Ste nets ten Sean ashen testates sheathes assent seethe Ne senses thee stets aesthetes sens hashes sea nest ashes sheets heat tenant tenths see these tenets stashes neatness tee setts hen theses hastens

lesson.text: notate tenons Seton soothe noses atones ethos hoses tosses season Soto tenon hottest soon hoes toes oat oneness shot shoot onto oases aeons snot hots shoe Otto note Eaton hoe anon stoat nos toots not stetson ohs oaths toast steno Tahoe stetsons atone notates Aston Hosts hosanna snoots Tonto tonnes Shoshone Noah soothes to anons tho shone Sassoon
